title: Time is Running Out to Vote in the EVE Online CSM19 Election
description: The election for the 19th Council of Stellar Management in EVE Online is set to close at 11:00 UTC on Thursday the 24th, which mean that for those of us in the US, Wednesday is effectively the last day to vote. If you have an Omega (which is to say, subscribed) account that is older […]
author: Wilhelm Arcturus
excerpt: The election for the 19th Council of Stellar Management in EVE Online is set to close at 11:00 UTC on Thursday the 24th, which mean that for those of us in the US, Wednesday is effectively the last…
text: The election for the 19th Council of Stellar Management in EVE Online is set to close at 11:00 UTC on Thursday the 24th, which mean that for those of us in the US, Wednesday is effectively the last day to vote. Council of Stellar Management 19 If you have an Omega (which is to say, subscribed) account that is older than 60 days you are eligible to vote. To learn about the CSM, what it does, and how you can vote, the links below are much more useful than, say, going over the r/eve and reading whatever is going on there today. html:
The election for the 19th Council of Stellar Management in EVE Online is set to close at 11:00 UTC on Thursday the 24th, which mean that for those of us in the US, Wednesday is effectively the last day to vote.

Council of Stellar Management 19

If you have an Omega (which is to say, subscribed) account that is older than 60 days you are eligible to vote.

To learn about the CSM, what it does, and how you can vote, the links below are much more useful than, say, going over the r/eve and reading whatever is going on there today.

  • CCP – CSM 19 – Cast Your Vote Now!
  • CCP – CSM Voting Page
  • CCP – CSM19 Dev Blog
  • CCP – CSM 19 Candidate Announcements
  • CCP – CSM Candidate Campaign Forum
  • CCP – The Roles and Duties of a member of the Council of Stellar Management
  • EVE Uni – Council of Stellar Management

In addition, I have all 47 candidates listed below with links to their required campaign forum post (except Storm Delay whose post I could not find):

Candidate Alliance Corp
Aerodinamica Attiva None Reckless and Uncontrolable Feeding
